name: Kitchen Sink (Mika Pi)
description:
Hello! I started a new project sort of challenge: one game a week. I hope at the end of the year 2023 we will have here 50 mini-games.

2-Floating islands

Coming soon...

1-Shelter

Here is the very first game I made in about a week base on the theme Shelter.

It is a sort of mix of FPS and tower defense.

Your goal is to protect the last shelter on Earth from Mushrum aliens. You can shoot them with the paint gun or place a tower that will shoot aliens. Aliens can drop scrap or medkit. You can use scrap to build defense towers or fix the tower and shelter. And you can use a medkit to heal yourself.

The code of the game is open source with an MIT license, feel free to drop a PR.

https://github.com/mika314/KitchenSink
